Name: MockAPIDeviceConnector
Author: Test Publisher - test@example.com
Description:
The Mock API Device Connector solution provides the ability to ingest device data from a mock API endpoint into Microsoft Sentinel for testing and demonstrating the Codeless Connector Framework (CCF) capabilities. This solution is designed for testing and development purposes.

**Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:**

This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies:

a. [Azure Monitor Data Collection Rules (DCR)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/essentials/data-collection-rule-overview)

b. [Codeless Connector Platform (CCP)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/create-codeless-connector)
